title: Rewterz Threat Alert ICS: Johnson Controls Metasys Vulnerability

titles: Rewterz Threat Alert ICS: Johnson Controls Metasys Vulnerability

sentences: Johnson Controls Metasys could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an issue with session token is not cleared on logout. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain session token information, and use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.
Refer to Johnson Controls for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information.
